documents.document: I'm on Radio New Zealand's The Panel from 3:45pm to 5pm today talking about the big issues of the day - and the Sevens. @radionz
Prople pouring into Wellington Stadium have officially taken the crowd status up to "virtually empty". #sevens
@nzjambo @annikakes @malthouse I'd pay money for Lorne Sausage without the hassle of pretending to like the bread, salad and condiments
@nzjambo @annikakes @malthouse I think the issue is around calling it a sandwich, and it is more of a too fluffy roll.
@nzjambo @annikakes @malthouse We are talking about the same thing. Small square flat Scottish bread rolls.
That awkward moment when you get an email from an organisation you never subscribed to but are like "well, that is quite interesting." #FWP
Blog: @malthouse Scottish Session - beer, haggis, whisky, tatties, neeps, kilts, rugby and BattleStar Galactica - https://t.co/Bc7U7UA1sC
@buzzandhum @ForkandBrewer @MelissaCole @BeerKel I can confirm wrestling is the sweetest of all arts.
@pdmjohns Not doing well am I? Except for this beer, 20 year old whisky, and haggis and black pudding pizza...
My Scottish passport has been revoked after I mixed up Burns Day with St Andrews Day - and rightly so.
Happy Saint Andrews Day! To celebrate, Scotland lost... at cricket... to the United Atab Emirates... #freedom
My AT-ACT has been named - Scruffy - as in Scruffy Nerf Herder and it also fires Nerf Missiles. Thanks for all the… https://t.co/VWjvxZQhpC
Blog: Scottish beer takeover, Lorne sausage, Scottish #Sevens, #deepfriedhaggisonastick, poems, freedom - https://t.co/1vRwOdmhWN @malthouse
Ah, the Wellington Summer. I shall have to put more sunblock on. Oh wait, I meant raincoat. #wellymania
@buzzandhum Love the franchise - but this series is a little odd. At least Avon is the star.
Today's Insomnia Morning Theate is Blakes Seven Series Four. I have mixed feelings about this. #teamavon
On yet another Chris de Burgh music binge. He sure does sing about War and Christianity a lot. #noborderline
@Fitz_Bunny I liked summer before it was cold....
Dear Wellington - do you understand the concept of summer? Like, even on a theoretical level? Love, Wellingtonians
Definition of Optimism: Guy walking to work in 148km/h winds... with an umbrella. #wellington
Disclaimer - that is not my bottom in the @malthouse photo. #iwish
@buzzandhum The Flying Squad? Guv'nor? Check out how much they drink on duty!
I am watching Chris de Burgh concerts. I am not ashamed. I'm a fan. May own all his albums... #yesido
@philipreeve It does not have to be a name of a Top Ten Beer - go creative!
@philipreeve That one I do not get...
COMPETITION NAME - Name my new #StarWars AT-AT action figure (NOT a toy) and I will buy you a beer from my Top Ten… https://t.co/EI02GjFSkt
@martynsims This knowledge warms my tiny dark heart!
@simon_ob @malthouse Not the only one do to that, tiger!
Neil's Top Ten Kiwi Beers of 2016: Always fun, sometimes controversial. Who makes the coveted list? https://t.co/BnWXfsXSYr @malthouse #BEER
OMG. Can Trump become US President without the endorsement of "A-List Celebs"? Turns out the Constitution says "yep".
Huge Kudos to the @BasinReserve and Wellington Cricket. We won the semi-final - and they served @panheadbrewery and @TuataraBrew - Win/Win!
While I was away on holiday my printer turned itself back on to announce it was somehow suddenly out of yellow ink. #weird #OfficeSpace
@GrowFromHereNZ The Big Apple. Somewhere between Napier and Wellington!
Back from a fantastic holiday featuring @tamsynbadland, chicken wings, @baylandsbrewery, @MboroughBrewery, cheese @WestshoreInn and fun.
Neil's Beer of the Week: @MboroughBrewery Foxy Red Dry Hopped Red IPA which is especially good fresh off the tap at the brewery. #nbotw
Yesterday I went to a roadside fruit and vegetable stall... and bought a black pudding.
@JessikaJayne Yeah - It was Whitewater - not Watergate. Several decades apart. And my point was #VRWC was a distraction from the issues.
@JessikaJayne She made up the #VRMC then to cover her husbands infidelities. We are not that organised. Just ask Vince Foster. #filesgone
@JessikaJayne Yeah - it was a joke certificate that you could print off the Interwebs. I haz no idea how you guys starting tweeting about it
@JessikaJayne @OurPowderDry Not sure you guys got my picture - I am a right winger in New Zealand and someone gave me the VRWC certificate.
Blog: The @malthouse Year in Review, Trump, West Coast IPAs, beer & music matching, @EpicBeer Son of Thor (Chilli) https://t.co/pnNWI9Ap6X
That moment when you laugh at something you forgot you wrote: "Next time, we drink to monkeys - because everything is better with monkeys."
@MaxRashbrooke Willie Nelson wants his royalties for that #oldjoke (well played)
Muppet Alert: saying #LanceArmstrong "still managed to win the Tour de France seven times, and even with drugs that's pretty amazing" #cheat
Craft Beer Corner Column in @cuisinemagazine - @LordAlmightyAle Stone Forest Ale with skewered beef hearts - went t… https://t.co/vtDu7sLI95
Today is my annual work Christmas Party. It is at the @malthouse if anyone wants to join. There will be plenty of room for obvious reasons.
Beer blog: Christmas rant, @EpicBeer takes over, @Garage_Project #12kegs for Christmas (yay), new menu - https://t.co/aSraMOJb9R @malthouse
Just chilling with my Imperial crew (and random the Sand Person) at the midnight premiere of #rogueone in Wellingto… https://t.co/K7kKKeaZ2D
Of all the hashtags my phone should know, I thought @epicbeer would be top of the list... Sorry all.
Just switched from Heineken at a function to @eicbeer Thunder at a pub. Staff probably suspicious of my giant grin.
@starbeer Doing a title in seventeen syllables can be very diff...
@The_Bottleneck @buzzandhum Agreed. "Wonderful Wheat Beers Wet My Whistle" is the still the worst inflicted on one my articles.
@buzzandhum I do not run anywhere. You know that. Turns out the answer was more Confucius (this is a magazine article, not @malthouse blog)
@starbeer Asian style beers - found a good Confucius quote - and it is politically topical here right now!
@secondzeit I quoted Confucius - hardly ever goes wrong.
That awkward writers moment when you finish (what you think) is a good beer article. But you just cannot think of a suitable title.
Dear Spellchecker - no matter how many times you try to "correct" it, I am never ever submitting a beer article saying "fewer aftertastes".
Summertime: An article about summer beers - which are not even a real style anyhow. https://t.co/sBwraVxCtF @DeepCreekBrew @julesvanc
@BoganBeer That rare moment when I am going to be the least offensive person in the room. Last recorded example - 2003 (by accident).
Neil's Beer of the Week: @MboroughBrewery Hop Elixir - literally, first beer purchased out of the new Featherston Tavern craft beer fridge.
President Elect Trump selects @WWE Linda McMahon for Cabinet. She may not kick ass but she can kick some grapefruits https://t.co/JPGb7v69Wo
@dpfdpf Some of us knew that was coming. She has run for Senate before and is a major donor.
Epic beer blog: 13 tap takeover for @EpicBeer 11th birthday, Star Wars and @johnkeypm's favourite beer - https://t.co/G2ZTJzxXIw @malthouse
Cool moment (2010) when every political leader in New Zealand declared their favourite beer to a blog - https://t.co/DklWxnq9gv @malthouse
My battle with (Man of the Match) David Warner makes it into a Canadian beer blog. Because we be awesome, eh.… https://t.co/0XoHb2aBKO
@its_not_lupus @HayleyHeartbrk @DearMama_ @abbey_maree @morgy85 Oh what a maneuver!
@jonogaluszka Wow. It's been a while since that (admitted great) column.
Treasures from the Thorndon Fair. Ducks, sloths, Pukekoes and geekery. https://t.co/s3eLqJzhjc
Neil's Beer of the Week: @MboroughBrewery Black Nectar Stout. Popular vote winner at a high-powered tasting this week #nbotw @BrewersGuildNZ
@nzpost Oh a number of issues today - may need an email address as it is way over 140 characters!
34 minutes on hold for @nzpost and then get a voice saying they have technical difficulties and cannot answer the call.
Currently on hold for over 20 minutes to contact @nzpost - at least they are playing a fine selection of Kiwi songs as hold music! #rockon
Some Nickelback sign explanation for @davidwarner31 - thanks @radionz.
@SmithiesGrant I'm sending this to David Warner...
@NZDistiller You would be surprised at how many people have sent me this piece of genius!
Heavy construction noise at 11pm - outside three apartment buildings - for wastewater work finishing in February. #wcc #dickmove #noteqnz
Nothing like a couple of small but noticeable aftershocks to get one to put proper pants and shoes on. The joys of working from home. #eqnz
Beer Blog: Rainbow Project collaborative beers between UK and NZ brewers - and boy are they creative!: https://t.co/MgiKTrEbhI @malthouse
@jaynefrances63 @NakulMPande @QldBaggie Never denied it. Said he didn't know what it meant.
@NakulMPande @jaynefrances63 @QldBaggie I freely admit that sign was the inspiration. Then I found it is also a thing in US sports.
@Independent It may have something to with the fact that he did not have real elections, far less term limits. He was a tyrant.
Fidel Castro - Sic semper evello mortem tyrannis" ("Thus always I bring death to tyrants"). #nolegend
The word hero is bandied atound too often, Spilled Beer Guy at #NZvPAK is my hero. @markmywordsCGW
@greigmcgill @PirateLifeBeer @mcleodsbrewery @BehemothbeerNZ @malthouse Oi. That has been pointed out to me by my girlfriend!
@monica_mead You provide a great quote - you make it into the story! #moreofasweetbaconsandwich
@mcleodsbrewery It is such a good cause I decided to take it to the extreme. Luckily I will be buying one today to save my soul.
Ah Wellington - today - attend a Japanese festival, drink @PirateLifeBeer at @malthouse, then support @SPCAWgtn at @BlackDogBrewCo #welly
Beer Blog: Pirates, @PirateLifeBeer tap takeover, @mcleodsbrewery/@BehemothbeerNZ colab, sausage rolls https://t.co/4SQpcPuYww @malthouse
Today's insomnia theater is Starship Troopers. Thankfully, I adore this film.
This is how you do political satire... well played @garwboy https://t.co/IfuhWBSOGH
Wellington - Hi-Vis is the New Black. #eqnz
Blog: Cider, earthquakes, Ciderhouse, I almost picked President Trump, Canberra beer, footnotes -> https://t.co/ZNmz1P0NuY @malthouse #eqnz
A rare photo of me doing good - collecting monies for @SPCAWgtn https://t.co/bC6XJwlKdr
Dear earthquake. You knocked my Chuck Norris autobiography off the book shelf and onto the floor. This will not end well for you. #eqnz
@HuwZealand Had a lot of fun in that bed with the piggy we stole from the shed...
@glennhendry Three pairs - just to be safe.
Today's dress code is "dress like you might have to run out of the building and stay out for a few days" #eqnz
Yeah - sleeping is way over-rated. #eqnz #rollinrollinrollin Safe.
Sunday evening. Hoppy beer, listening to John Denver, and missing my lady.
Collecting for the SPCA outside David Jones this morning (8-10). Give me money! #spca
